version_description: • Minor bug fixes
• Introducing Apple Pay: Enjoy the use of Apple Pay with your BMO Debit and Credit Cards at the cash register
Minor bug fixes and technical enhancements for optimal user experience
•Minor bug fixes and technical enhancements for optimal user experience
•iOS 10 Compatibility

• Fixed an issue where card is not remembered on sign in when device storage is low.
• Fixed loss of Touch ID Login on remembered cards.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience the above issues caused.

As we cannot reply to app store comments and in order for us to help you resolve any issues you encounter with BMO Mobile Banking please write us at feedback@bmo.com or through the Message Centre in BMO Online Banking. Alternatively you may also contact us at 1-800-363-9992.

• View pending transactions for your BMO Credit Card:
You will now see transactions that have been authorized but not yet posted to your account in your transaction history.
• Minor bug fixes and technical enhancements for optimal user experience.
Quickly view your BMO Credit Card reward details and easily redeem your points for rewards.
Fixed error when accessing Find Us, Security, Privacy and Legal links.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.

Now you can set up ongoing payments or transfers in BMO Online or Mobile Banking!

New Interac e-Transfer®* features:
•Fulfill Request for Money: Accept or decline a request for money. When you agree to the request, this action will send the money and automatically deposit it into the requestor’s bank account.
•Autodeposit Recognition: Send an Interac e-Transfer®* transaction to someone who is registered for Autodeposit without the need for a security question and answer.

Welcome to the latest version of BMO Mobile Banking! We worked hard to create a simplified, customized experience that makes mobile banking even easier.

What’s new? A whole bunch. Here’s what we’re most excited about:
• A new, personalized experience
• Simplified layout and easy-to-use navigation
• Quick account previews with 3D touch
• Streamlined actions so you can save time transferring money, paying bills, and more
• View and redeem BMO Credit Card rewards
• Access your eStatements anytime, anywhere
• Set up Apple Pay for all your cards
• Void cheques: Now you can download a PDF copy of a void cheque, making it even easier to set up direct deposits or regular payments! Available under your bank account details.

• Request money: now you can send someone a request for money. Find it under INTERAC e-Transfers in the “More” menu.
• Paying bills: Get ready for tax season and add CRA and BMO RRSP products easily with payee shortcuts.
• Help: Find help information now on the main page of the “More” menu. Find helpful information about your credit card balance when viewing transactions. And find information on how to pay a bill, send money and make a transfer.
• Security and Privacy: find this information more easily now on the main page of the “More” menu.
• iOS 12.2 compatibility fixes

• Enhancements and bug fixes.
• Deposit a cheque: remember you can take a picture with your phone and cheques go straight to your account! Find it in the “Pay & Transfer” menu and in the “More” menu.

Welcome to the latest version of BMO Mobile Banking! We’re working hard to create a simplified, customized experience that makes mobile banking even easier.

Here’s what we’re most excited about:
•A new, personalized experience
•Simplified layout and easy-to-use navigation
•Streamlined actions so you can save time transferring money, paying bills, and more
•Access your eStatements anytime, anywhere
•Ongoing bug fixes such as clear display of credit card transactions and iPhone X support

Thanks to all our customers for your valuable feedback – please keep the comments coming!

We’ve heard all of your feedback and have made some exciting changes:

•Finally…Mobile Cheque Deposit! - Look for the new feature in the Move $ menu
•Moved Sign Out button to top of the ‘More’ menu and improved sign out experience
•Fixed automatic Face ID/Touch ID login after signing out and corrected issues with saved cards.
•Transfer and Pay a Bill no longer start with the number pad
•Added credit card details and replaced (i) icon with Account Details icon, on transaction history page
•Improved iPhone X support
•Improved overall stability and minor bug fixes

•Autodeposit –Deposit funds directly into your account when you receive an INTERAC e-Transfer without answering a security question. To register your email select More> INTERAC e-Transfer>Manage Autodeposit
•Replaced lock icon in the password field with face/fingerprint icons to initiate Face ID/Touch ID prompt
•Fixed issue where some customers experienced freezing on sign out
•Fixed issue when receiving an INTERAC e-Transfer where users were unable to scroll

• Deposit a cheque added to the ‘More’ menu
• Amount fields now use native keyboard
• Added ‘Account Details’ button to Credit Card & Line of Credit history
• Accounts now grouped under categories in summary
• ‘$ Move’ renamed to ‘Pay & Transfer’
• Added statement balance/minimum payment due options, when using Pay Credit Card

• Forgot your password? You can reset it straight from the app. Also, scan your card numbers to save time! Find it on your sign in screen under “Forgot Password?”
• iOS 12 support
• Fixed various sign in issues

• Daily debit card limits: see how much money you can bring into and send out of your account in a day. Find it under “Daily debit card limits” in the “More” menu.
• Paying bills: see details of your last bill payment as you’re about to pay your next bill, and get a heads-up if you’ve scheduled a payment.

• Enhancements and bug fixes.
• Deposit a cheque: remember you can take a picture with your phone and cheques go straight to your account! Find it in the “Pay & Transfer” menu and in the “More” menu.

• Request money: now you can send someone a request for money. Find it under INTERAC e-Transfers in the “More” menu.
• Paying bills: Get ready for tax season and add CRA and BMO RRSP products easily with payee shortcuts.
• Help: Find help information now on the main page of the “More” menu. Find helpful information about your credit card balance when viewing transactions. And find information on how to pay a bill, send money and make a transfer.
• Security and Privacy: find this information more easily now on the main page of the “More” menu.
• iOS 12.2 compatibility fixes

•Deposit a cheque: Now deposit a cheque to your account in fewer steps! “Deposit a cheque” is in the “Pay & Transfer” menu and in the “More” menu.
•BMO Verification Codes: as you use your account, we may ask you to enter a code to verify it’s you. This is extra security to keep your account safe.
• Void cheques: Now you can download a PDF copy of a void cheque, making it even easier to set up direct deposits or regular payments! Available under your bank account details.
• Now you can apply for a personal line of credit and find out right away if you're approved!
• Minor Bug Fixes
• Minor bug fixes

• iOS 13 compatibility
• Minor bug fixes

•Now add Debit and Credit cards to Apple Wallet by selecting ‘Apple Pay’ from the More menu.
•Enhanced e-Transfer experience.Enhanced e-Transfer experience.

New features:
• BMO QuickPay: Now pay phone and utility bills in a flash. Email your bill to QuickPay@bmo.com, and we'll send you back an SMS. Reply "Pay" and that's it, your bill is paid up!

Improvements
• Account details: Find your account info more easily thanks to a new design. Tap into your BMO accounts to have a look!
• Open an account: Now you can easily search for info on new accounts and apply for a new account in no time. All from the "More" menu.

Dispute a credit card charge right from your account!
See a transaction you don’t recognize? Now you can select it within the app and let us know right away. Tap on your credit card account, choose a charge under the “Transactions” tab then tap to dispute. It’s that easy.

Now it’s easy to know who you sent INTERAC e-Transfers to and who you received them from, because their names will appear right in your account transactions. Another simple way to keep track of your money.

Get your credit score straight from the app!
Go to the “More” menu and select “My Credit Score”. It won’t impact your credit, and it’s free!

Lock your credit card from making purchases
Misplaced your credit card? Lock and unlock it whenever you like. Go to “Manage cards” in the “More” menu.

Replace a lost or stolen credit card!
Tell us and we’ll send you a replacement card. Visit “Manage cards” in the “More” menu.
